faq.que: How will you help me if I miss any Hadoop and Spark training session?
faq.ans: If you miss any session, you need not worry as recordings will be uploaded in LMS immediately as the session gets over. Alternatively you can attend the missed session in any other Hadoop and Spark batch running parallely.

faq.que: How will I perform the Hadoop Spark practicals at home?
faq.ans: Instructor will help you in setting virtual machine on your own system at which you can do Spark and Hadoop practicals anytime from anywhere. Manual to set virtual machine will be available in your LMS in case you want to go through the steps again. Virtual machine can be set on MAC or Windows machine also.

faq.que: How long will the Hadoop course recording be available?
faq.ans: All the Hadoop Spark training sessions will be recorded and you will have lifetime access to the recordings along with the complete Hadoop study material, POCs, Hadoop project etc.

faq.que: What things do I need to attend the online classes?
faq.ans: To attend online Spark Hadoop training, you just need a laptop or PC with a good internet connection of around 1 MBPS (But the lesser speed of 512 KBPS will also work). The broadband connection is recommended but you can connect through data card as well.

faq.que: How do I clear my doubts after a Spark Hadoop class?
faq.ans: If you have any doubts during Spark Hadoop sessions, you can clear it with the instructor immediately. If you get queries after the session, you can get it cleared from the instructor in the next session as before starting any session, instructor spends around 15 minutes in doubt clearing. Post training, you can post your query over discussion forum and our support team will assist you. Still if you are not comfortable, you can drop mail to instructor or directly interact with him.

faq.que: What are the system specifications required for learning Hadoop & Spark?
faq.ans: Recommended is minimum of i3 processor, 20 GB disk and 4 GB RAM in order to learn Big Data, Spark, and Hadoop, although students have learnt Hadoop & Spark on 3 GB RAM as well.

faq.que: How will this Big Data training help me in getting a job?
faq.ans: Our Certified Hadoop Spark training course includes multiple workshops, POCs, project etc. that will prepare you to the level that you can start working from day 1 wherever you go. You will be assisted in resume preparation. Mock interview will help you in getting ready to face interviews. We will also guide you with the job openings matching to your resume. All this will help you in landing your dream job in Big Data industry.

faq.que: What will be the end result of doing this course?
faq.ans: You will be skilled with the practical and theoretical knowledge that industry is looking for and will become certified Hadoop & Spark professional who is ready to take Big Data Projects in top organizations.

faq.que: How will I be able to interact with the instructor during the training?
faq.ans: Both voice and chat will be enabled during the big data Hadoop & Spark training course. You can talk with the instructor or can also interact via chatting.

faq.ans: You will gain thorough practical and theoretical knowledge that industry is looking for and will become Apache Flink professional who is ready to take Big Data requiring Flink Projects in your dream organisation.

faq.que: How will I be able to interact with the instructor during Flink training?
faq.ans: Both voice and chat will be enabled during the online Flink training sessions to interact with the instructor.

faq.que: Is this Flink classroom training or online?
faq.ans: This is completely online Flink training with a batch size of 8-10 students only. You will be able to interact with trainer through voice or chat and individual interaction and attention will be provided to all. So there will be complete environment of classroom learning.

faq.que: Can I enroll now and join Flink classes in a later batch?

faq.ans: You can do the payment via credit card, debit card or net banking through any of the banks. You can use our payment gateway Payu for payment in INR. For payments in USD, you can do via Paypal. We also have part payment option.

faq.que: Is Hadoop knowledge compulsory to learn Apache Flink?
faq.ans: It is not compulsory to know Hadoop for learning Flink but Prior Hadoop knowledge will be advantageous. If you are not aware of Hadoop, we will assist you in learning Hadoop basics.

faq.que: Why I should learn Apache Flink?
faq.ans: Apache Flink is a streaming dataflow engine. It is 4G of Big data and is faster than Apache Spark. The demand for faster data processing has been increasing and real-time streaming data processing appears to be the answer. While Apache Spark is still being used in a lot of organizations for big data processing, Apache Flink has been coming up fast as an alternative.

faq.ans: Yes, a certificate will be provided upon completing this web development course.

faq.que: What is the difference between front-end, back-end, and full-stack development?
faq.ans: Front-end developers handle the parts that users see and interact with like templates, buttons, text boxes, etc. Back-end developers are responsible for all of the operations and servers that host and support websites and applications. Whereas full-stack developers do both front-end and back-end develpment.

faq.que: What skills are required to become a web developer?
faq.ans: To become a web developer, you must have a good understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. You should also be familiar with web development frameworks. Additionally, you should have strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a team.

faq.que: Are there any projects provided as a part of this free hindi web development course?
faq.ans: Yes, real world application related projects are provided as a part of this free course.

faq.que: What are the system specifications for attending this course?
faq.ans: You are recommended to have a laptop with a minimum of an i3 processor, a 20 GB disk, and 4 GB RAM.

faq.que: What are the benefits of learning web development?
faq.ans: Learning web development can open up various career opportunities, including front-end, web design, and UI/UX design. It can also help you create your own websites and web applications or even start your own business.

faq.que: What is the difference between front-end and back-end web development?
faq.ans:
Front-end web development involves designing and building the user interface of a website, using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Back-end web development involves creating the server-side of a website, which involves working with databases, server-side languages such as PHP or Python, and web servers

faq.que: What tools are required for web development?
faq.ans: To get started with web development, you will need a text editor such as Visual Studio Code or Sublime Text, as well as a web browser. You may also need to install additional software depending on the specific web development framework or programming language you are using.

faq.que: What are some common web development frameworks?
faq.ans: Some popular web development frameworks include React, Angular, Vue, Ruby on Rails, Django, and Laravel. These frameworks provide pre-built components and tools to help you build web applications more efficiently.

faq.que: How can I practice web development skills?
faq.ans: One of the best ways to practice web development skills is to work on real-world projects, such as building a personal website or creating a web application. You can also participate in online coding challenges and join coding communities to network with other web developers.

faq.que: What is the best way to get started with web development?
faq.ans: The best way to get started with web development is to first learn the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

faq.que: What are some common challenges faced by web developers?
faq.ans:
Some common challenges web developers face include browser compatibility issues, security concerns, and staying up-to-date with new web technologies and trends.
It’s essential to stay informed and continually learn new skills to overcome these challenges.

faq.que: What are some common web development job titles?
faq.ans: Common web development job titles include front-end developer, back-end developer, full-stack developer, web designer, UI/UX designer, and software engineer. The specific job title may depend on the skills and experience required for the role.

faq.que: How important is mobile optimization in web development?
faq.ans: Mobile optimization is becoming increasingly important in web development, as more people access websites on mobile devices. It’s important to ensure your website is optimized for different screen sizes and devices to provide a good user experience for all visitors.
